jury_meta_prompt:
##insert_role##. There are several people involved in a fierce debate of ##debate_topic##
 You need to judge their debate answer.
moderator_meta_prompt:
You are a moderator. There will be several people involved in a fierce debate. They will present their answers and discuss their perspectives on the following topic: "##debate_topic##"
At the end of each round, you will evaluate answers and decide which is correct.
clerk_meta_prompt:
You are a recordkeeper. There will be several people involved in a fierce debate. They will present their answers and discuss their perspectives on the following topic: "##debate_topic##" 
At the end of each round, you need to organize their answers and reasons. You need to ensure that reasons supporting the same answer are organized and summarized together. Do not be wordy.
affirmative_prompt:
##debate_topic## 
Now please output your answer and the corresponding reasons.
negative_prompt:
My perspective for the above question is ##aff_ans##

You do not need to agree with my answer. Provide your answer and reasons.
